thread.title: Ouch, will Polavaram jibe hurt Naidu?
thread.title_full: Ouch, will Polavaram jibe hurt Naidu?

author: Deccan
title: Ouch, will Polavaram jibe hurt Naidu?
text:
Deccan Chronicle | October 11, 2015, 23.27 pm Andhra Pradesh Chief Minister N Chandrababu Naidu. (Photo: DC/File) The remark on his uncle Chief Minister N. Chandrababu Naidu’s prestigious Polavaram project in the promotional trailer of Sher may land Kalyanram in trouble. A satirical dialogue by actor Prudhvi “Polavaram project veedi pelli jariginatte vuntayi, kani jaragavu, chiragga” (Polavaram project and his marriage are always being planned, but both never happen, which is irritating) could upset the government. Whether the dialogue will survive the Censor cut is yet to be seen
 Tollywood chandrababu Naidu kalyanram Polavaram project Also Read Many junior artistes survive just on chai Actress Madhumitha set to make a come back 100 per cent power by October 25: AP Chief Minister Chandrababu Naidu Copycat spree continues
